metadata.description: Marketplace containing two Claude Code plugin systems for Peninsula School District: production-ready development workflow automation and experimental self-improving AI meta-learning system

plugins.name: psd-claude-workflow
plugins.description: Comprehensive development workflow commands and agents for Peninsula School District - includes issue management, architecture planning, security audits, testing, and PR workflows with compound engineering principles

plugins.name: psd-claude-meta-learning-system
plugins.description: Self-improving AI development system that learns from interactions, automatically implements improvements, evolves agents, and predicts future issues - built for Peninsula School District
